title: "Can We Teach Machines To Think Twice?"
excerpt: "As humans, we think many times before speaking our thoughts out loud. But, can we expect the same from machines? Last week, Deepmind introduced PonderNet, a new algorithm that allows artificial neural networks to learn to think for a while before answering."
